column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Eventsandparticipants | Event # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=I took a public bus to get the work this morning .
#id=2
#text=At around 8 am , I left my apartment and walked to the nearest bus stop which was about a 10 minute walk from home .
#id=3
#text=Once I got there , I waited for the bus to arrive along with two other people .
#id=4
#text=After about 15 minutes , an express bus heading to Manhattan arrived .
#id=5
#text=I boarded the bus and paid the driver my fare .
#id=6
#text=I then walked to a window seat near the front of the bus , that was free .
#id=7
#text=It was pretty early , and the bus was initially somewhat empty .
#id=8
#text=However , several stops later , the bus was filled with fellow commuters heading to work .
#id=9
#text=Along the way , the bus passed through about 5 different towns while traveling on local roads , before headed out to the George Washington Bridge to get to Manhattan .
#text=While getting there , the bus ran into a traffic jam which caused a 20 minute delay .
#text=After working its way through traffic , the bus made it onto the bridge , and several minutes later , we were at the bus terminal on 178th Street .
#text=Once we got there , the bus stopped and the driver let us out , whereby I then walked to the office .
